The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/26573).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [sipa](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26573#pullrequestreview-1800853604) |
| Approach ACK | [murchandamus](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26573#pullrequestreview-1658373638) |
| Stale ACK | [achow101](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26573#issuecomment-2057879299) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#29514](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29514) (tests: Provide more helpful assert_equal errors by ajtowns)
* [#28212](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28212) (test: verify spend from 999-of-999 taproot multisig wallet by eriknylund)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

>Alternative to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23502.

Not really an alternative, since https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26567 shouldn't be eligible for backporting, but this is arguably a fix.

IMO #23502 should still get reviewed & merged first, then let #26567 include this in its refactor.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
Concept ACK
Rebased.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
Moving this to draft for now, given it's based on #26567.
Rebased. Still based on https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26567.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
Rebased and undrafting now that #26567 is merged.

I assume the 1s here are the CompactSize length indicators for the witness items. It seems to me that any of the three could be more than 252 bytes, so perhaps you need to check for that and use 3 bytes for the CompactSize in case the corresponding element is longer?
One of those 1s should also be for the entire stack size, which could also be larger than 252.
Same here.
Seems better to use `GetSizeOfCompactSize` here.
Nit: leave -> leaf
Done.
Done

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
ACK 52cc58ab3ad0ee9df9ccc5303c7f0ce85cf8afee modulo rebase
Rebased.
